origin: localdomain
ttl: 3600

>>> zone_in.txt
; Applications.
dev.kilabit.info.  A  127.0.0.1
dev.kilabit.com.   A  127.0.0.1

; Documentations.
angularjs.doc       A  127.0.0.1

<<< zone_out.txt
$ORIGIN localdomain.
angularjs.doc 3600 IN A 127.0.0.1
dev.kilabit.com. 3600 IN A 127.0.0.1
dev.kilabit.info. 3600 IN A 127.0.0.1
